title: Apocalyptic & Infected Times Audio Music Pack
description: Apocalyptic & Infected Times Audio Music Pack includes 24 original soundtracks( from 0:50 sec to 12 mins /track) which cover a wide variety of possibilities for these genres.
longDescription:
The complete Apocalyptic & Infected Times Audio Music Pack includes 24 original soundtracks ( from 0:50 sec to 12 mins /track) , which cover a wide variety of possibilities for the genres of apocalypse, survival, horror, drama, suspense, tension, intrigue and others of great brutality and epic music pieces.


More Ambients, OST and sound effects will be include in next Updates. The complete Apocalyptic & Infected Times Audio Music Pack are the perfect audio resources (soundtracks, and coming soon: 8bits OST, sound effects and ambients) to use in your video games, trailer or some audiovisual product, packed with over 300 minutes of looping(and not looping) soundtracks. Coming soon sound effects (3D and SFX) and ambients too.


The soundtracks are composed in order to give the pack the ambient perfect for Apocalyptic and Infected worlds and lands, landscapes, moors, epic battles at end of times, sad and melancholic songs, hordes ambients, akelarres , epidemic/pandemic games and virus/infected atmospheres, exploring at dead lands, zombies, mystery and any horror and apocalyptic ambient that your product needs.


It´s perfect for apocalypse, horror, psychological drama-thrillers, end of the world & classical requiem overtures and atmospheres, drama, mystery, suspense, action, epic, war, frenetic hymns, dead marches, relaxing songs full of sadness, Sci-Fi scenes, sad but hope ambients and for sadness feelings or scenes.


Demo:

Apocalyptic & Infected Times Audio Music Pack.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  OST Folder : 24 original soundtracks for various styles ( from 0:50 sec to 12 mins /track).


Orchestral Style:


01 Infected Laments I

02 Puppet Army I (Black Metal Piece)

03 Another Fallout Refuge I

04 The Triumph of Death I (Sad Motete and Cantata)

05 Oriental Survivals I

06 A Funeral Cantata I (Based On Bach Funebre Passion)

07 The Lament Of The Usual People I

08 The Hole Of The Undead Kids I

09 Under A Moon Of Thorns I (Black Metal Piece)

10 A Small Exit I

11 Danse Macabre I (Based On C.S.Saints Metal Piece)

12 The Last Sad Sonata I (Based On Schubert 958)

13 Offering To Molech I

14 The Last Of Horseshoe Bats I

15 Quarantine I

16 A Gypsy Survival I

17 Slaves Singing Towards The End I

18 Global Lies I

19 Dies Irae I (Based On Mozart Requiem)

19 Lacrimosa I (Based On Mozart Requiem)

19 Requiem For A Nightmare I (Based On Berlioz Requiem)

20 Phandemy I (A Pandemic Fandango)

21 Bactericidal Extermination I (Black Metal Piece)

22 Le Solitaire Boheme I (Based On Puccini Opera)

23 Alone InThe Infected Moor I

24 24th March I


Number of Audio Wavs: 24.

Number of Audio Cues: 24.

Sample rate / bit rate: Wav/Stereo/44100Hz/32 bits.

Does music loop: Yes.

Minutes of audio provided: 130 mins (aprox).

Supported Development Platforms: All platforms detailed in the corresponding section.

Windows: Yes.

Mac: Yes.

All the art by us : Ibuproaudio.

Important/Additional Notes: Enjoy the package, good luck and thanks ;)
